meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Korin Kormick John Emery Stuart Anderson Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6689.

td.p: Korin Kormick, an opera singer from Jersey City, New Jersey
John Emery, a graduate student of financial engineering from Brandon, Florida
Stuart Anderson, a JAG originally from New Orleans, Louisiana (whose 2-day cash winnings total $26,800)

tr.td: THE ROLLING STONES
UNPACK YOUR ADJECTIVES
KENTUCKY-ANA
LANGUAGES IN THE USA
WEIGHTS & MEASURES
(Alex: And as a matter of fact, the 125th anniversary issue will focus on the power of photography, as will most of our clues.)
